property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only in response to a non-tactic card being deployed.
If you control [V][V][V], you may look at the top card of your deck. If you do, you may put it on the bottom.
Any opponent may pay 1. If they do, draw a card and terminate this card. Otherwise, terminate the non-tactic card being deployed.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: beast, monstrosity

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent discards any number of cards, this card gains X strength and X life this turn, where X is the number of cards discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character you control.
Put the card into its owner's hand. Put this card into play under its owner's control as a face-down resource instead of into their discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Choose a number for X. Put X characters you control into the void. Pick X+1 characters.
Put those characters into their owners's hand. Look at the top X+1 cards of your deck. You may put any number of those cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. Put the remaining cards on the top of your deck in any order.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: ritualist, eldridge

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE ELDRIDGE
When this card enters play or is destroyed, you may pick 3 or fewer non-resource cards you control. If you do, put up to 3 tokens divided however you want on those cards.
READY THE RITE
COST: Remove 2 tokens from this card. Pick a tactic you own in the void or in your discard pile.
EFFECT: Put the tactic into your hand.
TRIBUTE
COST: Pay 1. Destroy this card. Pick a player.
EFFECT: That player discards 2 cards. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE BIBLIOTHECA
This card enters play with 3 tokens on it.
This card gains 1 structure for each token on it.
RESEARCH
COST: Deplete this card. Put a token on this card. Pay 2.
EFFECT: Draw 2 cards. Put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.
CHECK OUT
COST: Deplete this card. Remove 2 tokens from this card.
EFFECT: Each opponent discards 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value:
COVERT
EXTRA COST: Pick a face-down resource you control and put it into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
[O][O][O][O]: COVERT
[V][V][V][V]: This character can block COVERT parties and non-COVERT parties.

property.name: Text
property.value:
This character loses 1 life and all non-Arcanist characters lose 1 strength for each token on this card.
SPREAD THE HATE

EFFECT: Put a token on this card.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: ignatius, blade of questionable morality

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE IGNATIOUS
When this card attacks, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may put any number of those cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. Put the remaining cards on the top of your deck in any order.
When this card inflicts damage to a faction, look at the top 2 cards of the faction's controller's deck. Put any number of those cards on the bottom of their deck in any order. Put the remaining cards on the top of their deck in any order. Draw a card.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value:

Search your deck for 5 cards with different names and reveal them. That player separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and shuffle the other into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card gains X strength, where X is the number of characters in play that your opponents own.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character you control. X is its cost. Put it on the bottom of its owner's deck. Choose a number for Y. Pay Y-X.
Search your deck for a character with cost Y or less and reveal it. You may deploy it for free. If you don't, put it on top of your deck.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: guard, tough guy

property.name: Text
property.value:
RECUR: [D][D][D]
COST: Use this only if this card is in your discard pile. Pay 1. Remove this card from the game. Pick a character.
EFFECT: If the character is depleted, destroy it.

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE AKASHIC OBJECT
When a card that provides at least [V] enters play under an opponent's control, you may pay 1. If you do, play a face-down resource attached to your faction. Otherwise, flip this card face-down under its owner's control.
FLIP UP: 3 [V][V]

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only during your turn and not during a battle. Pick an opponent.
That player names 2 non-Universal trades. Search your deck for a character that is one of the named trades and reveal it. If you do, put it into your hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE MARDUUN RUINS
Characters you control with a [V] icon in their rules text gain 2 strength and 2 life.

property.name: Text
property.value:
When this card enters play, you may put a token on up to X non-resource cards, where X is the number of [V] you control.
When this card is destroyed, destroy all non-resource cards with tokens on them.
TURN TO MUSH
COST: Pay 2. Pick a card with a token on it.
EFFECT: Flip the card face-down under its owner's control.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a player that controls more resources than you.
That player destroys a face-down resource they control.
FLIP UP: 4 [R]

property.name: Text
property.value:
[R][R]: This card gains 1 strength and loses 1 life.
[R][R][R]: Destroy this card.
When this card is destroyed, you may pick up to 2 characters and/or factions. If you do, inflict 2 damage divided however you want to those cards.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only while you are attacking, while there is a blocking party and before any damage is assigned during this battle. X is the number of characters in the attacking party. Deplete X non-attacking characters you control.
Remove all attacking characters from the battle. Add the depleted characters to the attacking party. Draw a card.
FLIP UP: 4 [R][R] and you may play a resource.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play you may pick a character. If you do, inflict 1 damage to that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: While a "gear" card is attached to this card, it gains 2 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character that is attacking your faction.
Inflict 1 damage to the character and remove it from the battle. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE BLADE OF LIGHT
The attached character gains 3 strength and 3 life.
This card does not leave play if the attached card leaves play.
EQUIP
COST: Pick a character. If it is a UNIQUE RUDOLPHUS then X is 0, otherwise X is 2. Pay X.
EFFECT: Attach this card to the character if you can.
SERAPHIM FUSION
COST: Use this ability only if this card is attached to a UNIQUE RUDOLPHUS. Pay 1. Destroy this card.
EFFECT: Search your deck for a card named "Vexillarius Dacian-Draco" and put it into play.

property.name: Text
property.value:
When this card enters play, you may pick a character. If you do, inflict 3 damage to it.
When this card is destroyed, you may pick a faction or location. If you do, inflict 3 damage to that card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only not during a battle. Pick a character or location.
Inflict 2 damage to the card. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
ATTACH TO CHARACTER
The attached character gains 1 strength, 1 life and cannot block.
[V][V][V]: The attached character gains 3 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value:
ATTACH TO CHARACTER (put this card into play attached to that character instead of into its owner's discard pile)
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only not during a battle.
When the attached character is blocked, inflict 1 damage to each member of the blocking party.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only not during a battle. Destroy a resource you control. Pick a character with 3 strength or less.
Restore that character. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
TACTICAL
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only not during a battle.
When this card enters play, inflict 1 damage to all characters.
[R][R][R][R][R][R]: When this card enters play, inflict 1 damage to all your opponent's characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: When battle damage is inflicted to this card while it's attacking, reduce the amount to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value:
FOR MY BROTHERS!
COST: Pay 1. Destroy this card.
EFFECT: Search your deck for a "soldier" card and reveal it. If you do, put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE TOLLBOOTH
If a non-token character would enter play under an opponent's control, they may pay 1. If they don't, put that character into its owner's discard pile instead.
[R][R][R][R][R][R]: When a character an opponent owns is put into their discard pile from anywhere, you may pay 1. If you do, pick a faction and inflict 1 damage to it.

property.name: Text
property.value:
This resource may only be played from your hand face-down.
PROVIDES: [R]
FLIP IT: [R]
COST: Use this only while this card is a face-down resource. Reveal this card. Pick a player. X is number of resources that player controls. Y is the number of resources you control. Pay 4.
EFFECT: Put this card into play face-up. Inflict X - Y damage to the picked player's faction.

property.name: Text
property.value: This character cannot block.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: rudo, blade of questionable morality

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE RUDOLPHUS
While this card is restored, all characters you control gain 1 strength and 1 life.
At the start of each turn, if this card has a 'gear' card attached to it, restore this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: PROVIDES: [R]

property.name: Subtype
property.value: fighter, tough guy

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNDERCOVERT OPERATIONS
COST: Pay 3.
EFFECT: This turn, this character gains COVERT and loses 1 life.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you deployed this card in response to a tactic, terminate the tactic. Put this card into play under its owner's control as a face-down resource instead of into their discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character you control. X is its strength. Destroy it. Pick a location.
If you control [V][V][V], inflict 3 damage to an opponent's faction. Inflict X damage to the location. If it is destroyed by that damage, draw a card.
FLIP UP: 3 [R]

property.name: Text
property.value: When a card that provides at least [V] enters play under your control, you may pick a character. If you do, that character gains 2 strength this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value:
FIRE!
COST: Use this only not during a battle. Pick a faction. Destroy a character you control. Pay 1.
EFFECT: Inflict 1 damage to the faction.

property.name: Text
property.value: [R][R][R][R][R][R]: This card gains 2 strength and 4 life.
